name: appearance
objective: Check the appearance of application switcher (Alt+Tab)
description: The application switcher must be presented as a screen overlay when typing the Alt+tab keyboard shortcut.

steps.description: type and maintain the Alt key then type and release the Tab key
steps.expected: the application switcher must appear on screen and conform to design guidelines

author: sdx

name: position
objective: Check the position of application switcher (Alt+Tab)
description: The application switcher overlay must be centered vertically and horizontally on the primary monitor

steps.description: type and maintain the Alt key then type and release the Tab key
steps.expected: the application switcher appears and is centered on the primary monitor

author: sdx

name: shown_apps
objective: Check the content of application switcher (Alt+Tab)
description: The application switcher must show all active windows / applications
pre_condition:
- switch to Home mode
- close all applications

steps.expected: the app switcher appears and shows only 1 app

steps.description: launch a second application and type Alt+Tab
steps.expected: app switcher appears and shows 2 apps, typing tab switches between the applications, releasing activates the selected application (app window is in foreground and has focus)

steps.description: launch a third application and type Alt+tab
steps.expected: app switcher appears and show 3 apps, typing tab repeatedly cycles through applications, releasing Alt activates the selected application (app window is in foreground and has focus)

author: sdx

name: ordering
objective: Check the apps order in application switcher (Alt+Tab)
description: The application switcher must show the applications order by time of last use (last used on left) (TODO: to be confirmed)

steps.expected: the switcher appears and show the applications in chronological order

author: sdx

name: overflow
objective: Check the overflow behaviour in application switcher (Alt+Tab)
description: In the Application switcher overlay, if more windows are active than can fit in a row then another row is added, the first row is moved to the top the of the screen grid
pre_condition: open 9 or more different applications (on Lenovo X230, the screen resolution is 1366x768 and only 6 applications are needed)

steps.expected: the switcher must appear and display the applications on 2 rows

author: sdx
